attributes.action: Reduce Sugar Content in Food and Drink
attributes.additional_details:
Reduce Sugar Content in Food and Drink.


The Petitioner submits that there is currently far too much unnecessary sugar in both food and drink products;


Unnecessarily and unhealthily high sugar levels are causing widespread Obesity and serious health problems such as Diabetes.


REQUEST:


The Petitioner suggests that Legislation is introduced to limit sugar content in both food and drink products.
